edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for displaying information to the user, taking input from the user, and telling the application how to proceed based on the input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean[] activeKeys
      Array of booleans who's value at any given index represent the active state of the key at the index value

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Application application)
        sets the state to beginning and starts update loop.
        Parameters:
        application - the application

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the list of valid key entries, handles input from user, and gives instructions based on what is happening in the game. Loops until program ends.

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput()
        Validates user input and performs commands based on what was input by the user and what was a valid input at the time the user made the input. Otherwise reports failure to acquire valid input to user.

      • getUserInput

        private char getUserInput()
        Gets and parses user input from console.
        Returns:
        the user input

      • isActive

        private boolean isActive(char key)
        Checks if a key command is active
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        true, if is active

      • wasTyped

        private boolean wasTyped(char key)
        Checks if a key command was active and valid at the time user entered it.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • setState

        public void setState(int state)
        Sets the UI state.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Sets the status message to be displayed on update.
        Parameters:
        status - the new status

      • addApplication

        public void addApplication(Application application)
        Adds the application that controls UI states.
        Parameters:
        application - the application
